title: Non Lynda | Skillfeed - Beginners Guide To Video Editing (2015)
description:
Non Lynda | Skillfeed - Beginners Guide To Video Editing (2015) 

MP4 | AVC 254kbps | English | 960x540 | 25fps | 1h 58mins | AAC stereo 128kbps 
| 1.84 GB |  Genre: e-Learning | Uploaded in Mar 15, 2015 By 2boweb


This is a foundational guide to edit professional video projects. This course goes into great detail to explain all the relevant skills needed to put you on a course to be a solid video editor. Upon finishing this course, all the tools are presented to begin editing professional projects. All files are provides with this course to follow allow. Any editor can be used. Project files included.
